tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE predictive_maintenance (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    reading DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Readings (
  reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  reading_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensors(sensor_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Sensors ( sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), model VARCHAR(255), installation_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE SensorData ( sensor_id INT, reading_time TIMESTAMP, reading_value FLOAT, PRIMARY KEY (sensor_id, reading_time) );
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs ( log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, maintenance_date DATE, maintenance_type VARCHAR(255), labor_cost FLOAT, FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensors(sensor_id) );

CREATE TABLE PredictiveMaintenanceResults ( result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, prediction_date DATE, maintenance_required BOOLEAN, confidence_level FLOAT, FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensors(sensor_id) );
